Summary: larger than a star and brighter moving around with a red light on bottom many of them
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a bright flash of light and yhought it was lighting.The sky was clear as a bell.The next thing I saw was what appeared to be a craft hovering and a top part of it was revolving slowly and flashing at equal intervals as if it was taking photos,it passed over me once and I could see one red strobe light on the bottom and it had no sound.I have seen approximately a dozen of them this week alone.They are so fast to move around but they also move very slowly also.I could go on all day I am so excited but I wont because typing is not my strong point HA
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lexington
This sighting has never been favorited.
